description: During the war, Shichirouji was http://anidb.net/ch3954 [Kanbee]`s pilot and partner in battle. Five years before the story starts, after narrowly surviving a raid, he gave up the samurai life and settled down with a woman named Yukino and helps her run an inn called the Firefly House. He likes the idea of a quiet life, and tries very hard to settle down, believing that fighting is not for him. However, after meeting Kanbee again, his taste for battle pulls him back.
name: Shichirouji
